ref_item.label: RIST4721
ref_item.description: RIST4721 as once-daily 300mg oral solution for 28 days.

pred_item.label: RIST4721
pred_item.description: Subjects received RIST4721 300 mg oral solution once daily for 28 days

ref_item.label: Placebo
ref_item.description: Placebo as once-daily 300mg oral solution for 28 days.

pred_item.label: Placebo
pred_item.description: Subjects received placebo oral solution once daily for 28 days

pred_item.name: RIST4721
pred_item.description: RIST4721 300 mg oral solution administered once daily for 28 days. RIST4721 is a small molecule CXCR2 antagonist with high selectivity for CXCR2 over CXCR1 and CCR2b, designed to block neutrophil migration to sites of inflammation.

pred_item.name: Placebo
pred_item.description: Placebo oral solution administered once daily for 28 days, matched to RIST4721 in appearance

ref_item.measure: Log Transformed Ratio of Postbaseline Fresh Pustule Count at Day 28 to Baseline
ref_item.description: Relative change from baseline in fresh pustule count at Day 28

pred_item.measure: Relative change from baseline in fresh pustule count
pred_item.description: Relative change from baseline in fresh pustule count at day 28. Fresh pustules were defined as macroscopically visible pustules that were white/yellow in color with no brown color, with or without crust, and present on the glabrous skin of the palms and/or soles.

ref_item.measure: Log Transformed Ratio of Postbaseline Total Pustule Count at Day 28 to Baseline
ref_item.description: Relative change from baseline in total pustule count at Day 28

pred_item.measure: Relative change from baseline in total pustule count
pred_item.description: Relative change from baseline in total pustule count at day 28. Total pustule count included all pustules present on the palms and/or soles.
